queries.query: I can’t connect WiFi on my phone.

answer.issue_summary: Cannot connect to WiFi on a Windows laptop.
plan_overview: Perform quick checks (Airplane mode, router status)
If all else fails, seek professional help

steps.title: Quick Checks
steps.rationale: Rule out simple issues before advanced troubleshooting.
steps.action: Check if Airplane mode is enabled. Check if the router is on and working correctly. Try connecting to a different WiFi network.
steps.expect: Airplane mode is off, router is working, and connection to another network is successful or unsuccessful.

steps.title: Check WiFi Adapter
steps.rationale: Ensure the WiFi adapter is enabled and functioning correctly.
steps.action: Open Network and Sharing Center. Click on 'Change adapter options'. Check if the WiFi adapter is enabled. If not, right-click and select 'Enable'.
steps.expect: WiFi adapter is enabled and functioning.

steps.title: Update WiFi Drivers
steps.rationale: Outdated drivers can cause connectivity issues.
steps.action: Open Device Manager. Expand 'Network adapters'. Right-click on the WiFi adapter and select 'Update driver'.

steps.title: Troubleshoot Network Settings
steps.action: Open Network and Sharing Center. Click on 'Troubleshoot problems'. Follow the on-screen instructions.
steps.expect: Network problems are identified and resolved.

steps.title: Restart Computer and Router
steps.rationale: Restarting devices often resolves temporary software glitches.
steps.action: Restart your computer and your WiFi router. Wait for both to fully boot up before attempting to reconnect.

steps.title: Seek Professional Help
steps.rationale: If all previous steps fail, the issue might require professional assistance.
steps.action: Contact your internet service provider or a computer technician for further assistance.

quick_checks: Check if Airplane mode is on
Check if the router is working correctly
Try connecting to a different WiFi network
escalation_criteria: Unable to connect to WiFi after trying all steps
safety_notes: Always back up important data before making significant system changes.
assumptions: Access to internet for driver updates
